entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Farnham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.5°C

Humidity: 71 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening except freezing rain over southern sections. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy except freezing rain over southern sections early in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
